title: (x) Tumblr Staff Blog font - Chaparral {Jan Erdmann}
content:
This typeface in the logo looks so familiar. What is it again?

[http://staff.tumblr.com/images/staff\_tumblelog/logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611194757/http:/staff.tumblr.com/images/staff_tumblelog/logo.png "http://staff.tumblr.com/images/staff\_tumblelog/logo.png")
author: chimerical
